original_text: Then Joab left David. He sent men to run after Abner with a message. They found him at the well at Sirah and they brought him back to Hebron. But David did not know that.
korean_text: 이에 요압이 다윗에게서 나와 전령들을 보내 아브넬을 쫓아가게 하였더니 시라 우물 가에서 그를 데리고 돌아왔으나 다윗은 알지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: He sent men to run after Abner with a message
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들을 보내 아브넬을 쫓아가 메시지를 전하게 했다

sentences.original_text: They found him at the well at Sirah
and they brought him back to Hebron
But David did not know that
